seo.description: A centralized business directory for architects, interior designers, and vendors in Miami. Designed to connect professionals, brands, and showrooms for design collaboration.
seo.keywords: business directory, architects, interior designers, design hub, showroom listings, Miami, Codersh

title: Design Nexus: Dynamic Business Directory for Architects & Interior Designers
overview: The client required a centralized business directory for architects, interior designers, and vendors in Miami. The platform had to connect professionals, brands, and showrooms, making it easier for users to discover and collaborate on design and construction projects.

features.heading: Searchable Directory
features.text: Build a searchable, user-friendly directory platform.

features.heading: Concierge Services
features.text: Add concierge services and articles to enhance engagement.

features.heading: Business Registration
features.text: Allow businesses to register, list services, and become members upon admin approval.

features.heading: Category & City Filters
features.text: Enable map and radius-based search with category and city filters.

features.heading: Advanced Search & Filters
features.text: Search by brand, showroom, pro, category, and city.

features.heading: Membership & Profiles
features.text: Allow self-registration for professionals and businesses.

features.heading: Content Sections
features.text: Concierge service and industry news integrated into the platform.

features.heading: Responsive Design
features.text: Modern mobile-optimized UI/UX for architects and designers.

techStack.heading: Integrations
techStack.text: Google Maps API (location-based search), Email Notifications
